name: ht-sqs-transport
description: An Amazon SQS Hudson Taylor transport

scripts.build: node ./node_modules/babel/bin/babel src -d lib && node ./node_modules/babel/bin/babel test-src -d test
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha -R spec --bail --check-leaks test/
scripts.coverage: npm run build && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --ui bdd --recursive -R spec -t 5000

author: Adam Brady <adam@boxxen.org>
